subject: Track and Field
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: The American decathlete Ashton Eaton bettered his world record, but Jamaica won the 4x100-meter relay at the world championships as the United States team botched a handoff.
snippet: The American decathlete Ashton Eaton bettered his world record, but Jamaica won the 4x100-meter relay at the world championships as the United States team botched a handoff.
